languages.text: "С ним, как и со мной, не все в порядке". {n}Металлические пальцы проводят по швам на лбу кибермастифа.{/n} "Но его еще можно починить — забери его, может, ты спасешься, и на флагмане техножрецы исправят... Я даже не представляю, что с ним сделали ксеносы".

"Like his master, there's something wrong with him." {n}His metal fingers trace over the stitches on the cyber-mastiff's forehead.{/n} "But he is not beyond repair. Take him — maybe you'll escape this place, and then the Tech-Priests on the flagship can fix him... I can't even guess at what the xenos have done to him."
languages.original_text: "С ним, как и со мной, не все в порядке". {n}Металлические пальцы проводят по швам на лбу кибермастифа.{/n} "Но его еще можно починить — забери его, может, ты спасешься, и на флагмане техножрецы исправят... Я даже не представляю, что с ним сделали ксеносы".

Take him — maybe you'll escape this place, and then the Tech-Priests on the flagship can fix him... I can't even guess at what the xenos have done to him."

Take him — maybe you'll escape this place, and then the Tech-Priests on the flagship can fix him... I can't even guess at what the xenos have done to him."

Take him — maybe you'll escape this place, and then the Tech-Priests on the flagship can fix him... I can't even guess at what the xenos have done to him."

Take him — maybe you'll escape this place, and then the Tech-Priests on the flagship can fix him... I can't even guess at what the xenos have done to him."

"Like his master, there's something wrong with him." {n}His metal fingers trace over the stitches on the cyber-mastiff's forehead.{/n} "But he is not beyond repair. Take him — maybe you'll escape this place, and then the Tech-Priests on the flagship can fix him... I can't even guess at what the xenos have done to him."

languages.text: 「主人と同様に、彼も正常じゃない」{n}ソロモーンは金属の指で、サイバーマスチフの額の縫い目をなぞった。{/n}「でも、まだ修復不能ってわけじゃない。彼を連れて行ってくれ。もしかしたらここから脱出できるかもしれないし、旗艦にいる技術司祭なら修理できるかもしれない…異種族どもが彼に何をしたのか、想像すらできない」
languages.original_text: "Like his master, there's something wrong with him." {n}His metal fingers trace over the stitches on the cyber-mastiff's forehead.{/n} "But he is not beyond repair. Take him — maybe you'll escape this place, and then the Tech-Priests on the flagship can fix him... I can't even guess at what the xenos have done to him."

traits.locale_text: 「主人と同様に、彼も正常じゃない」{n}ソロモーンは金属の指で、サイバーマスチフの額の縫い目をなぞった。{/n}「でも、まだ修復不能ってわけじゃない。彼を連れて行ってくれ。もしかしたらここから脱出できるかもしれないし、旗艦にいる技術司祭なら修理できるかもしれない…異種族どもが彼に何をしたのか、想像すらできない」

languages.text: "Wie mit seinem Herren stimmt auch mit ihm etwas nicht." {n}Seine Metallfinger streichen über die Nähte auf der Stirn des Cyber-Mastiffs.{/n} "Aber er kann repariert werden. Nehmt Ihr ihn – vielleicht entkommt Ihr von hier, und dann bringen die Techpriester im Flaggschiff ihn wieder in Ordnung ... Ich kann mir nicht einmal vorstellen, was die Xenos ihm angetan haben."
languages.original_text: "Like his master, there's something wrong with him." {n}His metal fingers trace over the stitches on the cyber-mastiff's forehead.{/n} "But he is not beyond repair. Take him — maybe you'll escape this place, and then the Tech-Priests on the flagship can fix him... I can't even guess at what the xenos have done to him."

traits.locale_text: "Wie mit seinem Herren stimmt auch mit ihm etwas nicht." {n}Seine Metallfinger streichen über die Nähte auf der Stirn des Cyber-Mastiffs.{/n} "Aber er kann repariert werden. Nehmt Ihr ihn – vielleicht entkommt Ihr von hier, und dann bringen die Techpriester im Flaggschiff ihn wieder in Ordnung ... Ich kann mir nicht einmal vorstellen, was die Xenos ihm angetan haben."

languages.text: « Comme son maître, il semble rencontrer de graves problèmes. » {n}Ses doigts métalliques effleurent les sutures qui ornent la tête du cyber-mastiff, avant de reprendre :{/n} « Mais il peut être réparé. Emmenez-le. Si vous parvenez à vous échapper d'ici, les technoprêtres du vaisseau amiral seront peut-être capables de le réparer... Je n'imagine même pas ce que ces xénos ont pu lui faire. »
languages.original_text: "Like his master, there's something wrong with him." {n}His metal fingers trace over the stitches on the cyber-mastiff's forehead.{/n} "But he is not beyond repair. Take him — maybe you'll escape this place, and then the Tech-Priests on the flagship can fix him... I can't even guess at what the xenos have done to him."

traits.locale_text: « Comme son maître, il semble rencontrer de graves problèmes. » {n}Ses doigts métalliques effleurent les sutures qui ornent la tête du cyber-mastiff, avant de reprendre :{/n} « Mais il peut être réparé. Emmenez-le. Si vous parvenez à vous échapper d'ici, les technoprêtres du vaisseau amiral seront peut-être capables de le réparer... Je n'imagine même pas ce que ces xénos ont pu lui faire. »

languages.text: «Como a su amo, le pasa algo malo». {n}Sus dedos de metal recorren las costuras que surcan la testa del cibermastín.{/n} «Pero aún se puede reparar. Lléveselo; quizá logren escapar de este lugar, y luego los tecnosacerdotes de la nave insignia podrán arreglarlo... Ni siquiera me atrevo a contemplar lo que le habrán hecho los xenos».
languages.original_text: "Like his master, there's something wrong with him." {n}His metal fingers trace over the stitches on the cyber-mastiff's forehead.{/n} "But he is not beyond repair. Take him — maybe you'll escape this place, and then the Tech-Priests on the flagship can fix him... I can't even guess at what the xenos have done to him."

traits.locale_text: «Como a su amo, le pasa algo malo». {n}Sus dedos de metal recorren las costuras que surcan la testa del cibermastín.{/n} «Pero aún se puede reparar. Lléveselo; quizá logren escapar de este lugar, y luego los tecnosacerdotes de la nave insignia podrán arreglarlo... Ni siquiera me atrevo a contemplar lo que le habrán hecho los xenos».

languages.text: “它和它的主人一样，也出了问题。”{n}他的金属手指抚摸着格雷托头上缝线的痕迹。{/n}“不过，它还没沦落到无药可救的地步。带上它吧，说不定你还能从这里逃出去。到时候，旗舰上的技术神甫可以把它治好……我根本不敢猜那些异形对它做了什么事情。”
languages.original_text: "Like his master, there's something wrong with him." {n}His metal fingers trace over the stitches on the cyber-mastiff's forehead.{/n} "But he is not beyond repair. Take him — maybe you'll escape this place, and then the Tech-Priests on the flagship can fix him... I can't even guess at what the xenos have done to him."

traits.locale_text: “它和它的主人一样，也出了问题。”{n}他的金属手指抚摸着格雷托头上缝线的痕迹。{/n}“不过，它还没沦落到无药可救的地步。带上它吧，说不定你还能从这里逃出去。到时候，旗舰上的技术神甫可以把它治好……我根本不敢猜那些异形对它做了什么事情。”

languages.text: "Tıpkı efendisi gibi o da yanlış yolda." {n}Metal parmaklarını siber mastifin alnındaki dikişler üzerinde gezdiriyor.{/n} "Ancak hâlen onarılabilir. Yanınızda götürün. Buradan kaçabilirseniz sancak gemisindeki Tekno Rahipler onunla ilgilenebilir. Zenoların ona neler yaptığını tahmin bile edemiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Like his master, there's something wrong with him." {n}His metal fingers trace over the stitches on the cyber-mastiff's forehead.{/n} "But he is not beyond repair. Take him — maybe you'll escape this place, and then the Tech-Priests on the flagship can fix him... I can't even guess at what the xenos have done to him."

traits.locale_text: "Tıpkı efendisi gibi o da yanlış yolda." {n}Metal parmaklarını siber mastifin alnındaki dikişler üzerinde gezdirir.{/n} "Ancak kendisi hâlen onarılabilir durumda. Yanınızda götürün. Buradan kaçabilirseniz sancak gemisindeki Tekno Rahipler onunla ilgilenebilir. Zenoların ona yaptıklarını tahmin bile edemiyorum."
